column5: Learn to conduct business in a rapidly transforming global landscape with this industry-accredited Masters.On this course you’ll consider the latest emerging issues in international business such as the rise of emerging market multinationals. You’ll also explore challenges to global innovation management and trade-offs in nurturing commercially sustainable international businesses.You'll learn to identify the motivations and methods for firms to enter and operate in foreign markets and address controversial issues in international business. You'll also plan your own international and strategic business plans.
